trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of the border for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a aparência da borda de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property enables you to specify the style of border to display on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade permite que você especifique o estilo da borda a ser exibido em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> enumeration and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> enumeração e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is displayed with a three-dimensional raised border.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> é exibido com uma borda elevada tridimensional.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is displayed with a three-dimensional sunken border.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> é exibido com uma borda em baixo relevo tridimensional.
